innhold.avsnitt: To be entitled to parental benefit, you must have worked or received money from NAV in six of the last ten months before you start drawing parental benefit. If you are unsure whether you are entitled to parental benefit, try our guide. lenke
Variable working hours, shift work, time off in lieu and holiday all count
If you have been in a job for at least four weeks and no more than 14 days pass between each time you work, we include the days you did not work in this period.
If you have an employment agreement with fixed shifts, we also include the days you did not work, even if you work less frequently than every 14 days.
Annual leave (holiday) and flexitime leave (time off in lieu of payment) count towards the period you must have worked to be entitled to parental benefit.
